key.note: The key that the search-query value belongs to.

value.note: The full-value that the search-query found.

type.note: The Artifact-Type that the search-query key-value result belongs to.

name.note: The name of the Artifact that the search-query key-value result belongs to.

_id.note: The _id of the Artifact that the search-query key-value result belongs to.
